about_the_game:
This is a roguelike card game with fantasy japanese style.
In the game, you will play the role of a cute girl and embark on a journey to explore the sakura mountain.

Game Features:
Dynamic Deck Building: This is a stand-alone roguelike card building game. Encounter more than 100 different cards on the way to sakura mountain, choose whether to add them to your deck, let the deck exert its power through combination and matching, defeat the enemy, and enter the depths of sakura mountain.

Ever-changing Sakura Mountain: Every time you start your sakura mountain journey, the mountain path changes. You will face different enemies,choose different cards and challenge different bosses.

Yin-Yang card System: We have made some gameplay settings that are different from previous roguelike card games. In the game you will use the yin-yang card system to complete the battle. It will be a whole new experience.Different from the previous roguelike card games that use the method of deducting the energy of the energy tank to play cards. This game will use the new Yin-Yang slot and Yin-Yang value system to play cards.

Story with monsters:You will encounter many interesting monsters in the game.And each round of the game. You can get a unique game story journey through dialogue with them,different attribute changes will also appear with it.


Simultaneously. The power of Genzai will also help you during the game.



Character Introduction:
Based on the character design of 《Liaozhai Strange Stories》. It's going to be a whole series of new fantasy characters.

Yingning
A half-demon born of a fox and a man. Naivety. Known for laughing.


World outlook:
In the game. You need to use the power of Genzai to explore the unknown sakura mountain.




More unshown game introductions will be updated as the game development progresses. Stay tuned please.

content_descriptors.notes: There are only a few decorative static images with partially scantily clad characters, the degree of nudity no more than the store page display image.

short_description: 《Genzai:Serialization》 is a fantasy Japanese style Roguelike card game. You will play a role of one cute girl to explore the Sakura Mountain and use cards with yin-yang system to defeat different enemies. Many interesting creatures will also bring you a variety of possible plot journeys.
